name: Civilization
wikiSummary: According to the Civilization Songfacts, the song featured as the soundtrack to an Adidas advertising campaign spearheaded by French director Romain Gavras, with whom Justice has worked in the past. The ad featured various sports stars, including soccer player David Beckham, pop singer Katy Perry, and Derrick Rose of the Chicago Bulls.
wikiText: According to the Civilization Songfacts, the song featured as the soundtrack to an Adidas advertising campaign spearheaded by French director Romain Gavras, with whom Justice has worked in the past.
